summary: The kedro_benchmarks package supplies a collection of performance tests for Kedro's core functionality, including data catalog handling, configuration loading, and pipeline runner execution. It offers custom catalog implementations, loader utilities, and helper pipelines to measure execution time and memory usage using the ASV framework.
business_intent: To monitor, evaluate, and optimize the runtime efficiency of Kedro components, enabling developers to detect performance regressions and guide improvements in data processing and pipeline execution.
